definition: to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image

pinyin: chuan4 xing2 dian3 zhen4 da3 yin4 ji1
zhuang4 ji1 shi4 da3 yin4 ji1
dian3 zhen4 shi4 da3 yin4 ji1

sentences.english: This week on the gadget Show, we find out what the best printers on the market are.
sentences.chinese: 在本周的小器具展上我们发现了市场上最好的打印机。

sentences.english: I stared at the sheets of paper lying facedown on the printer.
sentences.chinese: 我盯着打印机里面朝下搁着的一摞纸。

sentences.english: Kerning is only available for certain font types and, for printed documents, only works if your printer supports it.
sentences.chinese: 这选项是否有效取决于使用的字体和打印机是否支持。

sentences.english: Lanie, I'm going to print more printers.
sentences.chinese: 拉妮，我打算印出更多的三维打印机。

sentences.english: Thermal Printer A thermal printer uses heat elements to produce images on heat-sensitive paper .
sentences.chinese: 热敏式打印机全用热元素在热感应纸上产生图像。

sentences.english: Stallman's crusade for free software started with a printer.
sentences.chinese: 斯托曼的自由软件改革始于打印机。

sentences.english: Lock the wheels and adjust the height of the casters on the printer stand.
sentences.chinese: 将支撑轮锁定，然后调节打印机机座上的轮脚高度。

sentences.english: A new kind oil-soluble ink-jet printer ink was developed.
sentences.chinese: 研制出一种新型油溶性喷墨打印机墨水。

sentences.english: Computer-aided design programs use software to direct the printer.
sentences.chinese: 计算机辅助设计程序使用软件来控制打印机。

sentences.english: If the printer does not support borderless printing, the collection is empty.
sentences.chinese: 如果打印机不支持无边打印，则集合为空。

sentences.english: H-P is the top seller of personal computers and printers.
sentences.chinese: 惠普是全球最大的个人电脑和打印机销售商。

sentences.english: Do you know how to connect all these PCs to one printer?
sentences.chinese: 你知道怎样把这些电脑连在同一台打印机上吗？

sentences.english: These are good commands for resetting a printer, too.
sentences.chinese: 这些也是用于重置打印机的不错命令。

sentences.english: Testing using a real printer is costly and time consuming.
sentences.chinese: 使用实际打印机进行测试的成本高而且费时间。

sentences.english: Topping the list of common customer complaints are paper jams and problems connecting to a printer.
sentences.chinese: 普通顾客对打印机投诉最多的是卡纸和连接的问题。

sentences.english: Print to a local printer, disk, or Flickr.
sentences.chinese: 打印到本地打印机，磁盘，或者Flickr。
